cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA. 

The paper discusses reinforcement learning, which is a subfield of machine learning (cs.LG). It specifically focuses on the use of options, which is a popular technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and robotics (cs.RO) for encoding recurring behaviors and fostering exploration. The paper also mentions the task distribution involving problems with different levels of similarity, which is a common topic in systems and control (cs.SY) research. Finally, the paper discusses the search for optimal option sets, which is a problem that falls under the category of multi-agent systems (cs.MA).
